title: Enduro GLT Foil Full Set
compatibility: We recommend the 80 UHM, 80HM, and 80HR—also possible with the 85 UHM and 85HM. For dock starts and downwind sailing in accessible mode, choose the Cruiser 245; for versatility, choose HA43/HA40; and for performance, choose Ultra Glide 41. Standard fuselage for accessibility and short for maneuverability.

title: windfoil stabilizer occasion
compatibility: The 240 stabilizer is a homogeneous stabilizer allowing to sail in all conditions, from light to strong wind. With inertia and power, it will allow to cross all the wind drops of the water. The 200 stabilizer allows you to optimize your performance to get more glide and speed. It is oriented on a slalom/race practice. Both stabilizers are compatible with all front wings—whether they are from the 2022 range or the S and R ranges from previous years.

title: Tbar 95 cm occasion
compatibility: The TBAR (95cm mast/94.5cm body) is designed for a rider looking for performance in freeride/freerace. The TBAR (100 cm mast/105 cm fuselage). It is mainly intended for competitors or people doing up and down wind.
